attributes.name: disabled
attributes.title: Disabled
attributes.description: Sets the disabled state of the flipper

attributes.name: aria-hidden
attributes.title: ARIA hidden
attributes.description: Flippers are often a duplicate method of navigation, so by default they are hidden from assistive technology (AT). When set to true, the element is exposed to AT

attributes.name: direction
attributes.title: Direction
attributes.description: The navigation direction of the flipper

slots.name: previous
slots.title: Previous slot
slots.description: Slot to provide a custom icon to represent the 'previous' flipper state

slots.name: next
slots.title: Next slot
slots.description: Slot to provide a custom icon to represent the 'next' flipper state
